description.en: This is a romantic comedy about Sakura, a girl who gives her all for love and Matsuyuki, a boy who absolutely hates romance.

Korean national shooting team representative Im Sun-woo, aiming for his second consecutive Olympic gold medal, messed up his competition after rookie fencing team member Min Sunghan shook his hand and said, “I’ll take your chi~^^”.
When Sunwoo confronted Sunghan and demanded his chi back, Sunghan agreed and led him to a secluded place.
Sunwoo assumed Sunghan would return his chi with another handshake, but Sunghan suddenly kissed him, and the two exchanged chi through a deep kiss.
After exchanging chi like that, the two eventually ended up in bed together...
(※The protagonists of each short story will all compete on the same Olympic stage! Look for protagonists from other works in the final episode! ♡)

Lea wrote a suicide note ahead of the wedding.
Because she'll die after the first night.

It was the miserable end of a princess who devoted her entire life to her country and the royal family.
Before she gives up her life, Lea plans her final revenge on the royal family.

It is to become a new bride who has lost her innocence.

"Why did you give up your first experience like this? Don't you want to run away?
"I... want to die."

It was an impulsive remark because he was just a one-night stand.
I thought it was meant to end like that.
Until we meet again in an unexpected place.

He eroded her orderly daily life.
Despite knowing it was a dangerous relationship, she couldn't resist him.
What on earth is that man thinking?

"You don't remember?"
The man said with a fierce smile.

"I told you I'd ruin your life."
description.id: Putri Leah membuat surat bunuh diri menjelang pernikahannya. Karena dia yakin akan mati setelah malam pernikahannya; akhir yang sangat menyedihkan dari seorang putri yang mengorbankan hidupnya untuk kerajaannya. Tetapi sebelum menyerahkan hidupnya, Leah berencana untuk membuat balas dendam terakhirnya kepada keluarganya. Meskipun dia telah menjadi mayat yang dingin, dia akan membuat mereka hancur. Dia akan membuat mereka malu dengan menjadi pengantin yang tidak perawan lagi. “Kenapa kau justru membuang keperawananmu? Bukankah kau hanya ingin melarikan diri?" "Aku ... aku hanya ingin mati." Leah secara impulsif menceritakan hal tersebut kepada pria yang menghabiskan malam pertama dengannya.

title.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Extra Story - How to Spend a Certain Vacation

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件　番外編　～とある休暇の過ごし方～

altTitles.ru: О моём перерождении в слизь: Дополнительная история - как провести отпуск

description.en:
**Warning:** This Spinoff manga has spoilers from the Light Novel.

After successfully completing the Founding Festival, which includes meetings with the leaders of various countries, a martial arts tournament, technology presentations, and the unveiling of the underground labyrinth, the peaceful daily life in Tempest has returned. Then, Veldora begins to say, "I'm also thinking of developing magic beasts", and the three of them, including Rimuru and Hinata, who are interested in developing new magic, head for the Magic Tower, the sacred place of magic...?

This work is based on the Light Novel, and the timeline is from the end of Volume 9 to the beginning of Volume 10.
description.ja: 各国首脳との会談や、武闘大会、技術発表会に地下迷宮のお披露目と盛り沢山な内容の開国祭を無事に終え、穏やかな日常が戻ってきた魔国連邦(テンペスト)。そんな中、「我も獣魔術を開発しようと思う」とヴェルドラが言い始め、新魔法の開発に興味を抱いたリムル、そしてヒナタを加えた3人で魔法の聖地・魔塔へ向かうこととなり―――？

description.en: Laid-back and somewhat absent-mindedly seductive umbrella craftsman Shiro, and hot-blooded officer Kojiro, who stands against all things undisciplined, become involved in a bloody and erotic thrill-ride in an off-kilter town. This action-packed jack-of-all-trades manga will have you swooning at its sexiness and leave you more addicted than opium!
description.ja: ユルい着流しにノーフン（フンドシしてないってことダ）がちな妖艶系ぼんやり傘職人・詩郎と、だらしない人がぜんぜんゆるせない熱血正義漢（妹萌え）な巡査殿・光路郎が、世界の果てのまぼろしみたいな裏町でエログロ猟奇な事件に巻き込まれる！眉目秀麗悶絶お色気アクション・パノラマ百貨店、この阿片的中毒性！

description.en: Initially, Li Li only wanted to sleep with his roommate once, so he could get some money to help his family. But he didn’t expect that before the ‘crime’ could be committed, he would be caught red-handed by his roommate’s older brother, Yan Wen, who got evidence and warned him to stay away from his younger brother. Li Li thought Yan Wen hated him, but when he had no one else to rely on, it was Yan Wen who offered a helping hand. A contract of support then changed the two’s relationship forever…

The main character’s father passes away. The will states that each of the three siblings receive a portion of the father’s wealth. The main character receives a Porsche Carrera. She doesn’t know what a Porsche Carrera looks like, didn’t know the car company Porsche, can’t drive a manual and had absolutely no interest in cars, at the time.
A seemingly perfect looking newlywed couple but the affection is one-sided.
description.ja:
キミのこと、絶対オトしてみせるんだからーー! 
才色兼備なJK・皐月は、親の都合で婚約することに。相手は高校生囲碁棋士・久遠。 
イケメンで才能もある久遠との婚約で人生順風満帆…と思いきや、彼は超・塩対応男子だった!! 
部屋には立入禁止の赤札、皐月のモテテクもまるで通じず…そんな難易度の高い久遠を攻略し、二人にラブラブ新婚生活が訪れる日は来るのか!? 
くやしいけれど、きゅんとする! 完璧JKと塩対応囲碁男子の新婚生活ラブバトル、スタート!

altTitles.th: แม่มดกับทหารรับจ้าง

description.en:
Zig—a tall, broad-shouldered mercenary—participates in a witch hunt. Following a fierce duel with the deadly witch, he becomes privy to her desire. "I want you to protect me," she requests, tired of having her life trivialized. Seeking a place to survive, the witch and the mercenary set their sights on an unknown continent!
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10570/episode/350366)
[Official X Account](https://x.com/witch_mercenary)
description.fr: Zig, un mercenaire grand et large d'épaules, participe à une chasse aux sorcières. Après un duel acharné avec la sorcière redoutable, il découvre son désir. "Je veux que tu me protèges," demande-t-elle, fatiguée que sa vie soit prise à la légère. Cherchant un endroit pour survivre, la sorcière et le mercenaire tournent leurs regards vers un continent inconnu !
description.ja:
魔女討伐に参加した“双刃の傭兵”ジグ。死闘の果てに見た魔女の素顔は彼の想像とは異なるものだった。

「あなたに、私の護衛を依頼します」

命を狙われない場所を渇望する魔女、シアーシャ。二人は、未知なる異大陸への渡航を決意する。だがそこは、失われた魔術や凶悪な魔獣が蔓延る平穏とは程遠い異世界で…!?
description.vi:
「Phù thủy」――― Tại Lục địa nơi mà Ma thú lẫn Ma thuật đều đã hoàn toàn biến mất, Phù thủy trở thành thứ sinh vật bí ẩn duy nhất còn tồn tại.

Gig Crain, một Lính đánh thuê sở hữu thân hình cường tráng, đang trên đường tiến tới chinh phạt thứ tồn tại đáng sợ từ thời cổ xưa đó. Khi trận giao chiến khốc liệt khép lại, mặc dù đã giành chiến thắng đầy nhọc nhằn, anh cũng chẳng còn mục đích để xuống tay với Phù thủy nữa. Khi Gig không định kết liễu mà cứ thế rời đi, từ sau bóng lưng anh, Phù thủy có một yêu cầu...

"Tôi muốn anh bảo vệ tôi". Cô mong muốn được sống trong cảnh không bị truy đuổi. Tự giằng co ít lâu, Gig cuối cùng cũng đã chấp thuận yêu cầu đó. Tuy nhiên, không có nơi nào trên Lục địa này mà một Phù thủy, biểu tượng của sự sợ hãi, có thể sống yên ổn. Dẫu vậy, khi việc di chuyển giữa các Lục địa trở nên khả thi trong những năm gần đây, Phù thủy và Lính đánh thuê đã quyết định sẽ lên đường đi tới một Lục địa khác.

Tác phẩm Light Novel được chuyển thể từ Web Novel, nay đã có phiên bản Manga cùng tên!!
description.es-la: Zig, un mercenario alto y de anchos hombros, participa en una caza de brujas. Tras un feroz duelo con la mortífera bruja, se entera de su deseo. "Quiero que me protejas", le pide ella, cansada de que trivialicen su vida. En busca de un lugar donde sobrevivir, la bruja y el mercenario ponen sus miras en un continente desconocido.

description.en: Iinuma, a somewhat dull salaryman, eats food as his craving drives him! This is an appetite-stimulating gourmet manga where you can just watch him eating his food!
description.vi: Truyện xoay quanh một anh chàng nhân viên văn phòng có vẻ ngoài nhạt nhẽo tên Iinuma với tâm hồn ăn uống, luôn nghĩ đến chuyện măm măm cơm. Iinuma có phần Kanji của chữ “Ii” là 飯 - cũng có thể đọc là “meshi”, trong tiếng Nhật có nghĩa là cơm hoặc thịt. Mọi chuyện tưởng như không có gì để bàn tới nhưng đợi đã, xem biểu cảm khuôn mặt thỏa mãn chạm nóc vì thưởng thức món ngon của cậu ta kìa, có gì đó sao mà… lạ lắm à nghen! Cậu đang… ăn thôi đúng không!?

description.en: A sweet and happy two year marriage felt like a dream. One day, her husband disappeared without a trace. Han Seoryeong, an ordinary housewife and blind woman, desperately searches for him... “You’ll never find him.” Her husband turned out to be the best secret agent with many faces. “Our marriage was everything to me, but it was just ‘work’ to him?” In the midst of her world crumbling, Seoryeong mistakenly unleashes the madness she had been suppressing.…
description.fr:
Deux années de mariage aussi douces qu’un rêve.
Mais un jour, son mari disparaît sans laisser de trace.

Han Seoryeong, femme au foyer ordinaire et non-voyante, part à sa recherche,
mais la vérité qu’elle découvre dépasse l’imaginable.

Son mari était un agent secret aux cent visages,
et tout ce qu’elle croyait vrai n’était qu’une façade pour son “travail”.

Dévastée par le désespoir, Seoryeong laisse exploser la folie qu’elle avait refoulée.
Si elle ne peut pas le traquer, elle choisira de devenir sa proie !

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga

description.en: Takuya and Rika are co-workers for a travel agency and have barely ever interacted as they are both introverted, anti-social people. Both are doing their jobs as normal when an announcement from the higher-ups comes down: in one year, an overseas branch will be opening in Siberia, and an employee from their location will be sent to work there! While there's no telling who will be chosen to go, it is explained that people who are married and have families are far less likely to be sent! Neither Takuya nor Rika want to go to Siberia! Desperate to protect their solitary lives, they develop a plan: pretend that they are getting married to each other! Will they be able to keep up this charade for 365 days, and, maybe, even fall for one another in that time?
description.ja:
首都圏の旅行代理店、JTCの企画部に勤めるタクヤとリカは、共に人付き合いが苦手で目立たないが、充実した一人生活を送っていた。ところがシベリアの支店開設により独身者が優先で海外派遣されることになり、困ったリカはタクヤにとある計画を持ちかけて……。ほとんどしゃべったこともない二人が、たったの365日後に結婚することに！？

### 登場人物紹介
 
* 大原拓也●旅行代理店JTCの企画部所属。弱っている猫を保護している。やっと慣れてきた所なので家を離れたくない。

* 本成寺莉香●拓也の1年先輩。 クールに見えるが実は極度の人見知りで海外などもってのほか。 地図さえあれば幸せ。
description.ru: Такуя и Рика — коллеги по туристическому агентству, они практически не общались друг с другом, так как оба — интроверты. Оба заняты своим делом, как обычно, когда приходит объявление от вышестоящего руководства: через год в Сибири откроется зарубежный филиал, и сотрудник из их отдела будет отправлен туда на работу! Неизвестно, кого выберут, но объяснили, что вероятность того, что туда отправят женатых и имеющих семьи, гораздо ниже, чем одиночек! Ни Такуя, ни Рика не хотят ехать в Сибирь! Отчаявшись защитить свою одинокую жизнь, они придумывают план: сделать вид, что женятся друг на друге! Смогут ли они продержаться 365 дней и, может быть, даже влюбиться друг в друга за это время?
description.uk: Гонджоуджі Ріка та Оогара Такуя працюють у відділі планування туристичної агенції JTC в Токіо, вони не люблять спілкуватися і повноцінно живуть спокійним життям наодинці. Однак через відкриття філії в Сибіру Ріка запропонувала Такуї план, щоб не відправитися за кордон. Чи одружаться ці двоє замкнутих людей всього за 365 днів?
description.vi: Takuya và Rika là đồng nghiệp trong một công ty lữ hành ở Tokyo. Cả hai đều độc thân, nhưng họ không bận tâm, vì họ là những người hướng nội với cuộc sống viên mãn ở nhà. Thật không may, giờ công việc của họ là tìm kiếm nhân viên cho một văn phòng ở Siberia, và những nhân viên chưa kết hôn là những người đầu tiên được cân nhắc. Rika rất muốn tránh việc chuyển công tác và đến gặp Takuya với một ý tưởng: nếu họ giả vờ kết hôn sau một năm, họ có thể ở lại Tokyo. Vấn đề duy nhất là cả hai hầu như không biết nhau! Nếu hai người đồng nghiệp trầm tính này "giả vờ" một mối quan hệ, liệu nó có trở thành một mối quan hệ thực sự không?
description.pt-br: Takuya e Rika são colegas de trabalho de uma agência de viagens e quase nunca interagiram, pois ambos são introvertidos, pessoas anti-sociais. Ambos estão fazendo seu trabalho normalmente quando um anúncio dos superiores chega: em um ano, uma filial no exterior será aberta na Sibéria, e um funcionário de sua localidade será enviado para trabalhar lá! Embora não se saiba quem será escolhido para ir, explica-se que as pessoas que são casadas e têm família são muito menos propensas a serem enviadas! Nem o Takuya nem a Rika querem ir para a Sibéria! Desesperados para proteger suas vidas solitárias, eles criam um plano: fingir que vão se casar um com o outro! Serão capazes de manter esta farsa por 365 dias, e, talvez, até se apaixonar um pelo o outro nesse tempo?

title.en: Bannou Skill no Rettou Seijo Kiyosugiru no de Binbou ni wa Narimasendeshita

altTitles.ja: 万能スキルの劣等聖女 ～器用すぎるので貧乏にはなりませんでした～

altTitles.ja-ro: Banno Skill no Retto Seijo Kiyosugiru node Bimbo ni ha Narimasendeshita

altTitles.es-la: La Santa Inferior de Habilidades Versátiles: ¡Era tan Hábil que no Pudo Escapar de la Pobreza!

description.en:
"I never knew you were an inferior saint!"

Soara, who received the revelation of the saint, was invited to join her childhood friend, the hero Zeno's, party, where all members had S-rank skills, but she was expelled due to her lack of outstanding talent. Although shocked, Soara did not give up and turned into a freelance adventurer, deepening her friendships with the companions she met on her travels, and gradually recovering from the shock of being expelled from the party, she begins to flourish...
description.ja:
「お前が劣等聖女だったとはな！」

聖女の天啓を受けたソアラは、全員がSランクスキル持ちであり幼なじみの勇者ゼノンのパーティに期待されて誘われたものの、飛び抜けた才能がなかったため追放されてしまう。ショックを受けつつも、ソアラはめげずにフリーの冒険者へ転身し、旅先で出会った仲間たちと親交を深めて、少しずつパーティ追放のショックから立ち直って活躍していくのだが――？
description.es-la: ¡Nunca supe que eras una santa inferior! Soara, quien recibió la revelación de ser una santa, fue invitada a unirse al grupo del héroe con grandes expectativas, pero fue expulsada por ser una persona que sabía un poco de todo pero no dominaba ninguna habilidad en particular. Aunque sorprendida, Soara no se rinde y se convierte en una aventurera independiente. Profundiza sus amistades con Lumia, quien la apoya como su administradora, y con las habilidosas aventureras Elaine y Laura, a quienes conoce en sus viajes. Poco a poco, Soara se recupera del impacto de haber sido expulsada del grupo y comienza a tener éxito, pero... ¡Las chicas hermosas que enfrentan diversas dificultades están en acción! ¡La fantasía de las chicas de otro mundo que comienza con la expulsión empieza aquí!

description.ar: تسو تيانشين هو آخر إنسان حي في مدينة مليئة بالزومبي. فقط عندما كان متأكداً من أنه مات ، يجد روحه تعود إلى ما قبل ذلك اليوم المشؤوم قبل عشر سنوات. يقسم أنه سوف يحمي الناس المهمين له هذه المرة ويجتمع مع عشيقته. تابعوا نضاله من أجل البقاء بمساعدة ذكرياته للسنوات العشر القادمة!
description.en: Zuo Tianchen is the last living human in a mutated zombie-infested city. Just when he was sure he'd died, he finds his soul returned to just before that ill-fated day ten years ago. He swears he'll protect the people important to him this time round and reunite with his past lover. Watch his struggles to survive equipped with his memory of the next ten years!
description.fr: uo Tianchen est l'un des derniers survivants sur terre depuis qu'une épidémie venant de l'espace s'était abattue sur terre, il l'y a de cela 10 ans. Alors qu'il est sur le point de mourir, Zuo fît donc ses adieux à sa petite amie qu'il avait rencontré durant l'épidémie. C'est alors que, d'un coup, alors qu'il était sur le point de mourir, il retourna dans le temps 10 ans auparavant, quelques heures avant le début de l'épidémie. C'est alors qu'il décida de sauver son meilleur ami qui avait périt dès le début de l'épidémie, 10 ans auparavant, et c'est alors qu'il se met à la recherche de sa copine qu'il avait dans l'ancienne apocalypse.
description.ru:
Зе Тянчен – последний выживший человек в городе, зараженном зомби-инфекцией. Будучи на грани смерти, он внезапно оказался в своем теле десять лет назад, когда город еще не был заражен. Он решил, что в этот раз спасет близких ему людей и воссоединится со своей старой любовью.   
  
Следите за его приключениями, в которых он использует свои воспоминания о следующих 10 годах, чтобы выжить и спасти своих близких!

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

description.en: A handsome boy, the most handsome in his school, who is constantly receiving and rejecting girls' confessions. What they don't know is that he is in love with another boy.

title.en: Love Advice from the Great Duke of Hell

altTitles.fa: مشاوره‌های عشقی از اربابِ بزرگِ دوزخ

altTitles.uk: Любовні поради від величного герцоґа Пекла

altTitles.pl: Miłosna porada od Wielkiego Księcia Piekieł

description.en: The girl of your dreams barely knows you exist. Your friends can’t help. Your family is clueless. So where do you turn for love advice? Who can provide you with that essential assistance for the lovelorn? If you’re average everyday teenager Paul, you summon a powerful demon from deep in the recesses of Hell and frankly, hope for the best.
description.fa: دختر رویاهات روحشم خبر نداره که تو وجود داری. هیچ کمکی هم از دست دوستات بر نمیاد. خونواده‌ت هم از این قضیه خبر ندارن. خب حالا برای مشاوره گرفتن به کی رو می‌زنی؟ کی می‌تونه تورو که یه عاشق دل‌خسته‌ای، اساسی کمک کنه تا برای همه‌چیز آماده باشی؟ اگه یه نوجوون معمولی مثل پال باشی، یه شیطان گولاخ از اعماق دخمه‌های جهنم احضار می‌کنی و جدی جدی امیدواری که همه‌چی درست پیش بره!
description.fr: Un étrange étudiant invoque un puissant démon. Que peut-il bien vouloir ?
description.it:
La ragazza dei tuoi sogni a stento sa che esisti, gli amici non ti possono aiutare, la famiglia non ne sa nulla. Ma allora, dove cercare consigli d'amore? Chi può provvedere a darti quell'assistenza essenziale per il tuo cuore? Se sei il ragazzo della porta accanto, Paul, allora ti basta evocare un potente demone dai più profondi abissi dell'Inferno e, francamente, sperare per il meglio.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/unfins)  
- [Author's Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/unfins)

altTitles.ja: きみは四葉のクローバー

altTitles.en: You are a Four Leaf Clover

description.en: Uichi was once popular, but now he is being bullied excessively. Then suddenly, his first love, Yotsuha, appears in front of him. What is this cute and brave girl's purpose...?
description.ja: かつての人気者で、今は過激ないじめを受ける宇一。そんな彼の前に突然現れた初恋の相手・よつは。可愛く健気な彼女の目的とは一体…!?
description.vi: Câu chuyện romcom nhẹ nhàng về hành trình chữa lành trái tim đã tan vỡ của main
description.zh: 某天，曾很有人气的宇一的生活陡然一变。 以往光芒四射的日子被用抹布也无法擦去的黑暗所笼罩。 这时，熟悉宇一过去的初恋—— 四叶突然出现在了他的面前。 她的目的究竟是…！？

description.en:
A woman identical to me appears in my dreams, crying.  

"Who are you?"  

For three years, Shunaelle, the Demon King of the North, has been haunted by the same dream, growing curious about the woman and deciding to track her down.  

The truth? She’s a fragment of Shunaelle’s soul, cast away into the human realm.  

When Shunaelle tries to absorb the fragment back into herself, the woman resists.  

『I don’t want to be absorbed!』  

Instead, she makes a plea:  
If you want me back, live my life—a life filled with regret—and make it right.

Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
description.es: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.ru: Последние слова, произнесённые Королем Пиратов Гол Д. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!
description.uk:
Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.

Двадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях.
description.es-la: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.pt-br: One Piece começa quando Gol D. Roger, o Rei Dos Piratas que possuiu tudo nesse mundo, antes de ser executado, diz que escondeu o seu tesouro em algum lugar da Grand Line, um oceano extremamente perigoso. Desde então muitos piratas se aventuram pela Grand Line para tentar encontrar o tesouro chamado One Piece. Um deles é Monkey D. Luffy, o garoto que, acidentalmente, comeu uma das Akuma No Mi, a Gomu Gomu No Mi (Fruta da Borracha), e agora ele pode esticar seu corpo como se fosse uma borracha. A jornada dele começa atrás de companheiros e um barco, que ele vai conseguindo pouco a pouco, pois tem um objetivo: Ser o Rei Dos Piratas!!

description.en: A hardworking career woman who never married died alone, found in a miserable state. Her niece, Yamaguchi Narumi (35 and single), who was hit hard by the news shifted from looking for marriage to preparing for her death. She decided that the only way to die alone without bothering anyone and die better is to live the same way. This is the birth of a definitive beautiful human life story about facing love and death in earnest.

description.en:
Jiang Xiaoyong was betrayed and killed by a green tea girl in the apocalypse, but was accidentally resurrected a year ago and obtained the blind box system. 

He was always one step ahead of others, collecting supplies and spending a fortune to build a safe house before the apocalypse. He became stronger through the system and avenged his enemies in his previous life. 

From then on, he embarked on the road to the king's counterattack.

description.en: Indigo island is a place like no other, to deter emigration and attract tourism they have become the 'sex' destination as residents are punished if they are not have having frequent sex! On this crazy island, Hitori Misaki is still at school and one of the rare virgins trying to keep her secret and find love in such a lewd environment! The manga is based on the adult game "Nukitashi - Is this island Utopia or Dystopia?" by Qruppo!

altTitles.th: บิลลี่ แบ็ท

description.en:
Billy Bat is a comic-in-a-comic and the real protagonist is a Japanese-American artist named Kevin Yamagata who draws Billy Bat for "Marble Comics". Shortly after they transition to the artist in his studio with his assistant, two actual detectives, looking like Laurel and Hardy in Dick Tracy era suits and trench coats, knock on the door and appropriate Kevin's room for the purpose of conducting surveillance on a room in an adjacent building. 

One of the detectives, the skinny "Laurel", sees Kevin's work and it turns out he's a Billy Bat fan. The other chubby "Hardy" detective picks up a page saying that the characters look familiar and accuses Kevin of translating an old "Jap" comic.  
As Hardy remembers the comic he thinks Kevin is ripping off, we make another Urasawaesque time jump to 1949 Tokyo…
description.pl: "Billy Bat" przedstawia losy japońsko-amerykańskiego artysty Kevina Yamagaty, autora mangi o identycznym tytule co dzieło, w którym sam występuje, czyli "Billy Bat". Pracuje dla wydawnictwa "Marble Comics". Pewnego dnia do jego mieszkania pukają dwaj detektywi wyglądający jak Laurel Hardy z "Dick Tracy". Informują go, że otrzymali od gospodarza zezwolenie na przeprowadzenie śledztwa sąsiadującego budynku. Wkrótce jeden z detektywów, chudzielec Laurel, zauważa prace Kevina i okazuje się fanem "Billy'ego Bata", podczas gdy otyły Hardy podnosi pojedynczą stronę ze stwierdzeniem, iż komiks wygląda zadziwiająco podobnie do mangi publikowanej niegdyś przez Jumpa. Oskarża bohatera o kradzież tokijskiego dzieła z 1949 roku.
description.es-la:
Billy Bat es un cómic en un cómic y el verdadero protagonista es un artista japonés-americano llamado Kevin Yamagata que dibuja a Billy Bat para "Marble Comics". Poco después pasan al artista en su estudio con su ayudante, dos detectives reales que parecen Laurel y Hardy con trajes y gabardinas de la época de Dick Tracy, llaman a la puerta y se apropian de la habitación de Kevin con el fin de realizar una vigilancia en una habitación de un edificio adyacente. 

Uno de los detectives, el flaco "Laurel", ve el trabajo de Kevin y resulta que es un fanático de Billy Bat. El otro detective, el regordete "Hardy", coge una página diciendo que los personajes le resultan familiares y acusa a Kevin de traducir un viejo cómic "japonés".  
Mientras Hardy recuerda el cómic que cree que Kevin está copiando, hacemos otro salto temporal Urasawaesco al Tokio de 1949...
description.pt-br: Um detetive particular, é o protagonista da história em quadrinhos feita por Kevin Yamagata, um quadrinista americano, descendente de japoneses, famoso por sua história “Billy Bat”. O cotidiano de Kevin é abruptamente ado quando dois detetives entram no estúdio dele, a fim de investigar um vizinho acusado de espionagem. Um desses detetives vê o personagem Billy Bat e diz ter visto aquele desenho enquanto trabalhava no Japão. Suspeitando ter visto o personagem enquanto morava lá e o roubado inconscientemente, Kevin regressa ao Japão para buscar a verdade.

description.en: "My mother's body had no heart." The story of a daughter with a deformed blood who is called a "child of the devil" by her relatives.

altTitles.en: Will You Marry Me Because I Quit Being an Idol?

altTitles.pt-br: Estou deixando de ser uma Idol, mas você se casaria comigo!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Idol Yameru kedo Kekkon Shite Kuremasu ka!?

altTitles.vi: Anh Sẽ Kết Hôn Với Em Nếu Em Từ Bỏ Việc Trở Thành Thần Tượng Chứ?

description.en:
Sato Itto, an ordinary salaryman, has been shy about love due to an old trauma. Then one day, a reunion is held for the first time in several years. While they are having a good time talking about the good old days, suddenly Hebo, who has become an idol currently on hiatus, decides to attend the reunion!

Sato is upset to see Hebo, who was his first love. He manages to get over it with the help of alcohol, which he does not normally drink. When he wakes up, he finds the two of them naked in the same bed. As Sato desperately tries to recall his memories, Hebo shockingly says to him...!

"Marry me..."

What will happen to the marriage between the two who have no experience with love...!?
description.ja:
いたって普通のサラリーマンの佐藤一途（さとういっと）は昔のトラウマで恋に奥手になっていた。そんなある日、数年ぶりに同窓会が開かれることに。昔話に花を咲かせていると、急にアイドル休止ほやほやの枦保（へぼ）さんが出席することに!? 初恋の人だった枦保さんを前に動揺する佐藤。普段の飲まないお酒の力を借りてなんとか乗り切るも目を覚ますと同じベッドに裸の二人。必死に記憶を思い出そうとする佐藤に枦保さんから衝撃の一言が…！

「結婚して…」

恋愛偏差値0同士の結婚の行方は果たして―――！？
description.pt-br:
Sato Itto, um assalariado comum, tem sido tímido em relação ao amor devido a um trauma antigo. Então, um dia, uma reunião é realizada pela primeira vez em vários anos. Enquanto eles se divertem conversando sobre os bons e velhos tempos, de repente Hebo, que se tornou uma Idol que está atualmente em hiato, decide participar da reunião!

Sato fica chateado ao ver Hebo, que foi seu primeiro amor. Ele consegue superar isso com a ajuda de álcool, que normalmente não bebe. Quando acorda, encontra os dois nus na mesma cama. Enquanto Sato tenta desesperadamente se lembrar de suas memórias, Hebo lhe diz, de forma chocante...!

“Se case comigo...”

O que acontecerá com o casamento entre os dois que não têm experiência com o amor...?

altTitles.ja: 推し様なのでパパにしました

altTitles.th: เมื่อฉันอุปถัมภ์คุณพ่อจอมวายร้าย

description.en:
One day I woke up and I was six years old. I had transmigrated into the main character of a tragic novel, Saint Priscilla, who walks through all sorts of thorny paths! Since I’m here, I need to avoid the scheduled special misfortune and live happily with my favorite character. The final boss of the story and the villain, Melchizedek, the tyrant of the Rehel Empire, who has no blood or tears! A happy life of adopting my father and becoming a princess, with my favorite character. I also saved the male protagonist, in order to remove my father’s death flag.

“If you approach my daughter, you will die.”

Why does my father keep putting up death flags?

Moreover… “If you tamed me, you have to take responsibility.”

Why is the male lead so obsessed with me? What’s going on?

---
One day, a girl awakens as 6-year-old St. Priscilla, the heroine of her most cherished novel. The catch? She is destined to suffer with an abusive adoptive family! To avoid this, she adopts her ultimate bias, the ruthless Emperor Melkiades, as her father instead. Although spending her days fangirling and redeeming her bias's tarnished name seems like a dream come true, with so many foes still lurking in the shadows, can this young saint protect Melkiades and find happiness for them both?
description.ko:
어느 날 눈을 뜨니 여섯 살이 되어있었다.
내가 빙의한 건 온갖 가시밭길을 걷는 피폐 소설 속 주인공, 성녀 프리실라!

이왕 이렇게 된 거, 예정된 특급 불행을 피하고 최애캐와 행복하게 살아야 한다.
작중 최종 보스이자 악당,
피도 눈물도 없는 레헬 제국의 폭군, 멜키아데와 함께!

아빠를 입양해서 공주도 되고, 최애캐 덕질도 하는 행복한 인생.
아빠의 사망 플래그도 제거할 겸, 겸사겸사 남주인공도 구해줬는데...

"내 딸한테 접근하면 죽는다."

아빠는 왜 이렇게 자꾸 사망 플래그를 꽂는 거지?
게다가...

"날 길들였으면 책임도 져야지."

어쩐지 남주까지 내게 집착하는데, 이게 어떻게 된 거지...?

description.en: This tongue-in-cheek semi-autobiography follows the absurdly gruesome adventures of a lonely boy and his singularly crazed family. His escape from the madness that surrounds him is his collection of pickled animal and human body parts, to which he adds as one family member after another meet with a grotesque and sometimes terrifyingly funny death... (Source: AniList)

description.en: Luciel, a Crystal Fairy skilled in crafting jewels from her emotions, returns to the past after a life cut short by betrayal. Armed with the knowledge of a grim future, she proposes a contract marriage to the empire’s most villainous family. What begins as a desperate strategy to escape her fate soon becomes an adventure filled with unexpected warmth. Can Luciel rewrite her story, or will her past come back to haunt her?
With no savings, average qualifications, and a bank balance consistently below 10,000 won, can the Backbone Breaker Gye Baeksun really escape unemployment?

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

title.en: If You Dare to Long for Regret

altTitles.en: If you dare, I hope you regret it

description.en:
“If you marry me, you can go anywhere. Whether you must cross the seas or fly through the skies. Anywhere you wish. I’m the kind of man who can make that happen.”

Catherine, a lowly Duke’s daughter, has spent 25 years trapped in a castle. To her, this was an irresistibly tempting offer.

Her fiancé is Archduke Deimos Pendragon, the empero’s brother.

“I’ve been infatuated with you for a long time.”

His predatory gaze, now finally locking onto his prey, revealed his true intentions. This is no mere proposal, it is an unilateral order for her to become his wife.

“Catherine Caliburn, I will make you loved more than any woman beneath the sky.”

With his alluring smile, Catherine came to devastating realization that her plan to break off the engagement had utterly failed.

“So never, ever think of running away from me.”

For you are destined to die by my hand...

altTitles.th: สงครามเย็นสุดขั้ว

description.en: The Ice Age apocalypse is coming. After being betrayed and killed by my secret crush, I was reborn and gained a magical ability - the snacks I ate suddenly turned into plants? What's surprising is that this ability can be used in this way... Crisis is everywhere, I want to live for myself in this life!

title.en: Watashi no Hatsukoi wa Hazukashisugite Darenimo Ienai

altTitles.ja: 私の初恋は恥ずかしすぎて誰にも言えない

altTitles.en: My First Love is Too Embarrassing to Tell Anyone

altTitles.vi: Mối tình đầu của tôi quá xấu hổ để kể ra

description.en:
Chiaki is handsome, academically gifted, athletic, and born into a wealthy family with a beautiful sister. Despite his seemingly perfect life, he faces a persistent problem: he's never been lucky in love and struggles to capture the attention of girls. Determined to turn things around in high school, he wakes up one morning to a surprising transformation—he has turned into a girl!

He is shocked to find out that he has lost the appearance he was so proud of, but when he looks in the mirror, he sees a very cute girl in the reflection. He immediately goes to show it off to his twin sister Kaede, who happens to be very popular with the girls, but there is also something very strange happening to her...

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)
description.ja: 容姿端麗・学業優秀・スポーツ万能・お金持ち・姉妹は超美人。そんな順風満帆すぎる人生を送る八隅千秋には悩みがあった。なぜか全く女の子にモテない！そのせいか、生まれてから一度も恋をしたことがない！高校では必ずや女子にちやほやされる日々を送ってみせる!!…そう誓った翌朝、目覚めた千秋は女の子になってしまっていた。さらには妹・楓の身にも、とんでもない異変が起こっていて!?
description.vi: Chiaka là 1 đứa con nhà người ta, đẹp trai, học giỏi, có chân giữa dài 20 cm nhưng mỗi tội ế. 1 ngày đẹp trời cậu ta tỉnh dậy và phát hiện bản thân đã biến thành con gái !!

title.en: TenPuru -No One Can Live on Loneliness-

altTitles.es: Templo - Nadie puede vivir en soledad

altTitles.de: TenPuru: Von Einsamkeit kann man nicht leben

description.en: That's right, I'll become a monk! Not knowing what to do with his worldly desires, Akagami Akemitsu aims to live a stoic life. However, the thick karmic blood flowing in him will not permit it!
description.es: Así es, me volveré un monje! Al no saber qué hacer con sus deseos mundanos, Akagami Akemitsu aspira a llevar una vida estoica. Sin embargo, la espesa corriente de energía del karma que fluye en él no lo permitirá.
description.es-la: "É isso mesmo, eu vou me tornar um monge!". Sem saber o que fazer com seus desejos mundanos, Akagami Akemitsu decide viver uma vida estóica. No entanto, o sangue cármico espesso que flui nele não permitirá!

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

altTitles.vi: Nô lệ của đội tinh nhuệ Ma đô

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.vi:
Chiều không gian đầy quỷ dữ được gọi là "Ma đô" đã mở ra đe dọa đối với loài người. Tại đó, có một loài  "đào" ban cho kẻ ăn sức mạnh đặc biệt, giúp nhân loại có cơ hội chiến đấu, tuy nhiên, chỉ có nữ giới mới có thể sử dụng thứ sức mạnh "trái đào" ấy. Bởi vậy mà phụ nữ trở thành những người bảo vệ loài người, địa vị xã hội tăng cao, trong khi nam giới bị giáng xuống tầng lớp công dân hạng hai, giành giật nhau những công việc cơ bản và sự thừa nhận.

Nhân vật chính Yuuki Wakura, một nam sinh chăm chỉ yêu nội trợ, chị gái cậu đã bị bắt trong một sự kiện của Ma đô 5 năm về trước. Khi đang than thở về những khó khăn gặp phải, cậu đã bị lũ quỷ tấn công. Nhờ được đội trưởng Kyouka của Đội chống Quỷ kịp thời ứng cứu, cậu chấp nhận trở thành "nô lệ" của cô để có thể sở hữu sức mạnh tiêu diệt bầy quỷ.

Bất ngờ thay, việc làm "nô lệ" đòi hỏi một cái giá tương xứng...và người phải trả giá lại không phải là cậu.
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

title.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms with Dignity

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.pl: Kaoru i Rin. Rozkwitając z tobą

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.vi: Những đóa hoa thơm nở diễm kiều

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Bien qu'ils soient mitoyens, le lycée public Chidori pour garçons et le prestigieux lycée privé pour filles Kikyō continuent à entretenir leur tradition de se haïr mutuellement au plus haut point. Tsumugi Rintarō pensait la même chose, jusqu'à ce qu'il fasse la rencontre de Wakuri Kaoruko, élève de Chidori et habituée de la pâtisserie tenue par ses parents. Malgré la désapprobation et les préjugés de leurs camarades respectifs, Rintarō et Kaoruko vont petit à petit se rapprocher, et tant pis ce qu'en pensent les autres !

___
**Liens :**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.vi: Ở một nơi nào đó, có 2 trường cao trung lân cận. Cao trung Chidori, một trường nam sinh cấp thấp hội tụ đủ những thằng đần, trường nữ sinh Kikyo, một trường nữ sinh danh giá . Rintaro Tsugumi, một nam sinh năm 2 to khỏe và trầm tính tại trường Chidori, bắt gặp Kaoruko Waguri, một khách hàng khi cậu đang giúp việc tại cửa hàng bánh nhà mình . Rintaro cảm thấy thoải mái khi dành thời gian bên Kaoruko, nhưng cô lại là học sinh của trường Kikyo, ngôi trường hàng xóm cực kì căm ghét trường Chidori. Đây là câu chuyện về 2 con người ở rất gần nhưng lại rất xa
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

altTitles.ja: 愛してるゲームを終わらせたい

altTitles.en: I Want to End This Love Game

altTitles.fr: Je veux finir le jeu du "je t'aime"

altTitles.th: เกมสารภาพรักนี้น่ะเรามาจบกันเถอะ

altTitles.zh: 想让“我爱你”游戏快点结束

altTitles.fr: Je veux en finir avec le jeu de l'amour

altTitles.nl: Ik wil een einde aan het liefdesspel

altTitles.pt-br: Eu quero acabar com o jogo do "eu te amo"

altTitles.en: I Want to End the "I Love You" Game
I Want to End the Game That I Love

description.en: Childhood friends who have been together since they were little. They both realize their feelings for each other, but are too close to be honest. What connects them is the "I love you game" that they have been playing since they were little. The end of their love is decided in this simple game where the winner is the one who makes the other embarrassed!
description.vi: Đôi bạn thuở nhỏ luôn ở bên nhau từ khi cả 2 còn bé. Cả 2 đều nhận ra tình cảm của nhau, nhưng họ quá thân thiết nên không thể thành thực. Thứ kết nối họ là trò chơi "Tớ yêu cậu" mà cả 2 đã chơi hồi còn nhỏ . Kết cục tình yêu của họ sẽ được quyết định bằng trò chơi đơn giản này khi người chiến thắng là người khiến người kia phải xấu hổ.
description.es-la: Se conocen desde que eran niños. Ambos son conscientes de lo que sienten el uno por el otro, pero están demasiado unidos como para ser sinceros. Lo único que les une es el juego "Te quiero" al que juegan desde pequeños. Si haces pasar vergüenza a tu compañero, ¡ganas!
description.pt-br: Amigos de infância que estão juntos desde que eram pequenos. Eles percebem seus sentimentos pelo outro, mas são muito próximos para serem honestos. O que os conecta é seu “jogo do eu te amo”, que eles brincam desde que eram pequenos. O fim do seu amor é decidido nesse jogo simples onde o vencedor é aquele que deixa o outro com vergonha!

altTitles.ja: ビビッド・モンスターズ・クロニクル

description.en: In order to achieve her goal Yumeko Makino starts the game "Vivid Monsters Chronicle." This manga follows her and her friends who she meets along the way, in game and in real life.
description.ja: とある目的のため、ネットゲーム『ビビッド・モンスターズ・クロニクル』（通称：ビビモン）を始めた夢子。ゲーム内で偶然助けてくれた女の子がとても内気なクラスメイトで…!?個性豊かなキャラクター達がゲームの内外で心を通じ合わせる『ビビモン』の世界へ、いざ！

description.en:
Growing up in the late 16th century Sengoku era Japan, Shinmen Takezou is shunned by the local villagers as a devil child due to his wild and violent nature. Running away from home with a fellow boy at age 17, Takezo joins the Toyotomi army to fight the Tokugawa clan at the Battle of Sekigahara. However, the Tokugawa win a crushing victory, leading to nearly three hundred years of Shogunate rule. Takezo and his friend manage to survive the battle and afterwards swear to do great things with their lives. However, after their paths separate, Takezo becomes a wanted criminal and must change his name and his nature in order to escape an ignoble death.  
  
**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category in 2000.
- Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2002 
**Note:** was nominated for the 2003 Eisner Award in the Best Writer/Artist category.
description.es:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. A los 17 años, Takezou se escapa de casa con un compañero y se une al ejército Toyotomi para luchar contra el clan Tokugawa en la batalla de Sekigahara. Sin embargo, los Tokugawa obtienen una aplastante victoria, lo que da lugar a casi trescientos años de gobierno del Shogunato. Takezou y su amigo consiguen sobrevivir a la batalla y después juran hacer grandes cosas con sus vidas. Sin embargo, cuando sus caminos se separan, Takezou se convierte en un criminal buscado y debe cambiar su nombre y su naturaleza para escapar de una muerte innoble.  
  
**Premios:**
    - Ganó el 24º Premio Kodansha de Manga en la categoría general en 2000.
    - Ganó el Premio Cultural Tezuka Osamu en 2002
    **Nota:** fue nominado al Premio Eisner 2003 en la categoría de Mejor Escritor/Artista.
description.es-la:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. title.en: Dungeon ga Arawarete 5-nen, 15-sai de Dungeon ni Idomu Koto ni Shita.

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンが現れて5年、15歳でダンジョンに挑むことにした

altTitles.ja-ro: Dungeon ga Arawarete Go-nen, Juugo-sai de Dungeon ni Idomu Koto ni Shita.

altTitles.es-la: 5 AÑOS DESPUÉS DE QUE APARECIERAN LAS DUNGEONS, ME ATREVO A DESAFIARLAS A LA EDAD DE 15 AÑOS

altTitles.en: Five Years After The Dungeons Appeared, I Dare to Challenge at The Age of 15

description.en:
Dungeons appeared in the world five years ago. Police and military are unable to enter these enigmatic spaces, and entry is permitted solely by the free will of individuals aged 15 and above. Leveling up is possible, fantasy items can be acquired, and for some, the transformation can lead to becoming astonishingly beautiful.

Yuuta Rokujou has lived a life of being bullied since his kindergarten days. Due to this, he decided not to attend Dungeon High School that everyone else went to, rather, on his fifteenth birthday, he decided to challenge a dungeon alone.

This story is about how Yuuta, under such circumstances, became stronger than anyone else, becoming one of the twelve individuals capable of moving the world, known as the ‘Twelve Heroes.’
description.ja: ダンジョンが現れて5年。そこは15歳以上の人間の自由意志のみで入場が許可される不思議空間。学校生活に馴染めない六条祐太は、15歳の誕生日に1人ダンジョンに挑むことにしたが…!?

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure.

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.

Regarding That We Decided to Live in the Countryside With The Female Knight Who Came to Us

description.en: Saeki Kanji, 32 years old and still single, is living in the Japanese countryside, which is in decline. After graduating from university with a degree in economics he took a job as a salaryman in a leading company in Tokyo, but retired when he inherited the family farm in Mitsuyama village when his parents passed on. He soon took to the life of a simple farmer. One day a beautiful woman wearing full body armor came to his door begging to stay the night. She claimed to be royalty from another world and is unable to return there. She ends up living with Kanji and helping out the local agriculture situation.
description.ja:
とある片田舎で農業を営む佐伯莞爾（32歳）。一人気ままにのんびり田舎暮らしを楽しんでいたら、ある夜とんでもない訪問者が！剣！甲冑！どこからどう見ても「女騎士」…異世界から来たという彼女となりゆきで一緒に暮らすことになったが、前途は多難で…。

description.pt:
Saeki Kanji, 32 anos e ainda solteiro, mora em um campo japonês, que está em declínio. Depois de se formar em economia, ele aceitou um emprego como funcionário assalariado em uma empresa líder em Tóquio, mas teve que sair quando herdou a fazenda da família na vila de Miyama quando seus pais morreram e, assim virando um agricultor. Um dia, uma linda mulher vestindo uma armadura de corpo inteiro veio até a porta dela pedindo para passar a noite, ela alegou ser um membro da realeza do outro mundo e não pode voltar para lá, ela acaba vivendo com Kanji e ajudando ele na situação da agricultura local.

description.en:
The story of two foreign men living in Japan.

(from ebookjapan):

Nick, with his stylish hair, and Lever, with his dazzling eyes behind his sunglasses, are a HOT & CRAZY foreign duo who will face any obstacles that come their way! 

The genius Kyogoro Miyata, who wastes no time in drawing, unleashes a shocking high-speed manga. Nick and Lever are finally here!
description.es-la: Esta es la historia de dos extranjeros que viven en Japón: Nick, con su elegante melena, y Lever, con sus deslumbrantes ojos que se ocultan detrás de sus gafas de sol. Este alocado dúo se enfrentará a cualquier obstáculo que se les presente mientras tratan de sobrevivir día a día en la tierra del sol naciente.
